DOC.brief_summary: The study consist eligibility screen period , two study period involve single dos tocilizumab ( TCZ ) accord open-label , randomize , two-period crossover design interval 6 week period , 6 week follow-up period . Healthy participant receive single subcutaneous ( SC ) injection TCZ via pre-filled syringe-needle safety device ( PFS-NSD ) single injection via autoinjector ( AI ) . The total duration study 16 week screen follow-up . After screen , eligible participant randomly assign one two possible treatment sequence ( Sequence 1 : AI-1000 G2 follow PFS-NSD Sequence 2 : PFS-NSD follow AI-1000 G2 ) assign one three injection site ( 1 : abdomen , 2 : thigh , 3 : upper arm ) . All participant group receive total two TCZ administration .
DOC.brief_title: A Study Evaluate Bioequivalence Tocilizumab Following Subcutaneous Administration Via Autoinjector ( AI 1000-G2 ) Versus Pre-Filled Syringe Healthy Volunteers
